mapper.sql: RP_ID, ROLE_ID, PMSN_ID, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role_pmsn (RP_ID, ROLE_ID, PMSN_ID, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER) values (#{rpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmsnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_role_pmsn
ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PMSN_ID = #{pmsnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTMOD = #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RP_ID = #{rpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_role_pmsn set ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PMSN_ID = #{pmsnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTMOD = #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RP_ID = #{rpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_ID FROM sys_role_pmsn WHERE STATUS = 'E' GROUP BY ROLE_ID
